General.Name: TCM Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: TCM Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of various rugs and carpets in Thailand, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: TCM Flooring, TCM Living, and TCM Automotive. It offers Axminster and tufted carpets under the Royal Thai brand; carpets for internal flooring of the vehicles; upholstery fabrics for vehicles; and carpets for the corporate sector, including offices and commercial spaces. The company also provides sofa chairs; manufactures wooden flames for sofa chair; and sells flooring products. It serves hotels, theatres, airports, houses, palaces, cruise ships, casinos, and convention centers. TCM Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1967 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
